body:
Heyya everyone! Returning back to Avicus for good. For the past 2 months, I have been playing other things so yea....
Also really hyped for my interview tommorow. Wish me luck!

title: Returning to Avicus! AMA!

replies.body: Feel free to ask anything you want!

How's it going?

replies.body: Decent. Having alof of friendship issues and bullying. But in the virtual world, it's all good ;3
